page.title: 17SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: One out of four people thought that Longfield shops did not serve their needs but all 4 people went into the nearest town to buy cloths.Out of these people 2 came twice a week 1 came 4 times a week and the other came every day.On average 1 out of 5 people that came to the shop were men,mostly it was women coming to do shopping for food.All the people that came to these shops came from Longfield hill and lived only a few houses away 3 out of 4 people lived near enough to the shops for their journey to take two minutes but the other persons journey took 5 minutes.All the people we asked had walked to the shops so perhaps the families did not have a car and so therefore probably took the bus,from Meopham or Longfield to the town.
